words.source: H559 ʾamar, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV/ESV/NASB 'said'
H3068 YHWH, proper noun divine; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the LORD'
H413 ʾel, preposition; KJV 'unto', ESV/NASB 'to'
H4872 Mosheh, proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB 'Moses'
H3212 yalak, Qal infinitive construct + preposition be + 2ms suffix; KJV 'When thou goest', ESV 'When you go back', NASB 'When you go back'
H7725 shub, Qal infinitive construct + preposition le; KJV 'to return', ESV 'go back', NASB 'go back'
H4714 Mitsrayim, proper noun + directional he; KJV 'into Egypt', ESV 'to Egypt', NASB 'to Egypt'
H7200 raʾah, Qal imperative 2ms; KJV 'see', ESV 'see', NASB 'see'
H3605 kol, noun ms construct; KJV/ESV/NASB 'all'
H4159 mopheth, noun mp + article; KJV 'those wonders', ESV 'the miracles', NASB 'the wonders'
H834 ʾasher, relative pronoun; KJV/ESV/NASB 'which/that'
H7760 sum, Qal qatal 1cs; KJV 'I have put', ESV 'I have put', NASB 'I have put'
H3027 yad, noun fs + preposition be + 2ms suffix; KJV 'in thine hand', ESV 'in your hand', NASB 'in your hand'
H6213 ʿasah, Qal weqatal 2ms + 3mp suffix; KJV 'and do … them', ESV 'and you shall do them', NASB 'and you shall do them'
H6440 panim, noun mp construct + preposition le; KJV 'before', ESV 'before', NASB 'before'
H6547 Parʿoh, proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB 'Pharaoh'
H589 ʾani, independent pronoun 1cs + waw conjunction; KJV 'but I', ESV 'But I', NASB 'Yet I'

H2388 chazaq, Piel yiqtol 1cs; KJV 'will harden', ESV 'will harden', NASB 'will harden' — THEOLOGICALLY SIGNIFICANT: God actively hardening (Piel intensive) Pharaoh's heart; same root used for 'strengthen/make firm'
H853 ʾeth, direct object marker; not translated in KJV/ESV/NASB
H3820 leb, noun ms + 3ms suffix; KJV/ESV/NASB 'his heart'
H3808 loʾ + waw conjunction; KJV 'that he shall not', ESV 'so that he will not', NASB 'and he will not'
H7971 shalach, Piel yiqtol 3ms; KJV 'let … go', ESV 'let … go', NASB 'let … go'
H853 ʾeth, direct object marker; not translated in KJV/ESV/NASB
H5971 ʿam, noun ms + article; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the people'
